001package org.nasdanika.emf;
002
003import java.io.IOException;
004import java.util.ArrayList;
005import java.util.Collection;
006import java.util.Collections;
007import java.util.HashSet;
008import java.util.Iterator;
009import java.util.Set;
010import java.util.function.Function;
011import java.util.function.Predicate;
012import java.util.stream.Collectors;
013
014import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList;
015import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.TreeIterator;
016import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EAttribute;
017import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EClass;
018import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EClassifier;
019import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EDataType;
020import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EEnum;
021import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EEnumLiteral;
022import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EGenericType;
023import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EModelElement;
024import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.ENamedElement;
025import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EOperation;
026import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EPackage;
027import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EParameter;
028import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EReference;
029import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EStructuralFeature;
030import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.ETypeParameter;
031import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.Resource;
032import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.ResourceSet;
033import org.nasdanika.common.Context;
034import org.nasdanika.common.DependencyTracer;
035import org.nasdanika.common.NasdanikaException;
036import org.nasdanika.common.Util;
037import org.nasdanika.ncore.util.NcoreUtil;
038
039/**
040 * Generates Mermaid.js class diagram (https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid/#/classDiagram) text from Ecore models.
041 * 
042 * @author Pavel Vlasov
043 *
044 */
045public class MermaidTextGenerator implements DiagramTextGenerator {
046        
047        private static final String DIAGRAM_STYLE_KEY = "diagram-style";
048        private static final String RELATED_BACKGROUND = "#DDDDDD";
049        
050        // Default background: #FEFECE
051
052        // TODO - support of packages and fully qualified names -> get rid of Logical name?
053        
054        private Appendable collector;
055        private Function<EClassifier, String> eClassifierLinkResolver;
056        private Function<EModelElement, String> eModelElementFirstDocSentenceProvider;
057        private Predicate<EModelElement> elementPredicate;
058
059        public MermaidTextGenerator(
060                        Appendable collector, 
061                        Predicate<EModelElement> elementPredicate,                      
062                        Function<EClassifier, String> eClassifierLinkResolver, 
063                        Function<EModelElement, String> eModelElementFirstDocSentenceProvider) {
064                this.collector = collector;
065                this.elementPredicate = elementPredicate;
066                this.eClassifierLinkResolver = eClassifierLinkResolver;
067                this.eModelElementFirstDocSentenceProvider = eModelElementFirstDocSentenceProvider;
068        }
069        
070        private static final String EXTENDS_RELATION = "<|--"; 
071        private static final String IMPLEMENTS_RELATION = "<|..";
072        private static final String DEPENDENCY_RELATION = "..>";        
073        private static final String CLASS_COMPARTMENT_SEPARATOR_LINE = "\t__\n";
074
075        protected void appendClassStart(String modifiers, String classType, String name, String link, String style) throws IOException {
076                if (modifiers != null) {
077                        collector.append(modifiers);
078                        collector.append(" ");
079                }
080                
081                collector
082                        .append(classType)
083                        .append(" ")
084                        .append(name)
085                        .append(Util.isBlank(link) ? "" : " [[" + link + "]]")
086                        .append(Util.isBlank(style) ? "" : " " + style)
087                        .append(" {\n");
088        }
089        
090        protected String getLocalizedName(ENamedElement namedElement) {
091                return EObjectAdaptable.getResourceContext(namedElement).getString("label", namedElement.getName());
092        }
093        
094        protected void appendClassEnd() throws IOException {
095                collector.append("}\n");
096        }
097
098        private static String getSimpleName(String name) {
099                return name==null ? null : name.substring(name.lastIndexOf('.') + 1);
100        }
101
102        protected void appendMember(String modifiers, String visibility, String type, String name, Iterable<String> parameters) throws IOException {
103                collector.append("\t");
104                if (visibility != null) {
105                        collector.append(visibility);
106                }
107                if (modifiers != null) {
108                        collector.append(modifiers);
109                        collector.append(" ");
110                }
111                if (type != null) {
112                        collector.append(type);
113                        collector.append(" ");
114                }
115                if (name != null) {
116                        collector.append(name);
117                }
118                if (parameters != null) {
119                        collector.append("(");
120                        Iterator<String> it = parameters.iterator();
121                        while (it.hasNext()) {
122                                collector.append(it.next());
123                                if (it.hasNext()) {
124                                        collector.append(", ");
125                                }
126                        }
127                        collector.append(")");
128                }
129                collector.append("\n");
130        }
131        
132        protected void appendAttribute(String modifiers, String visibility, String type, String name) throws IOException {
133                appendMember(modifiers, visibility, type, name, null);
134        }
135
136        protected void appendOperation(String modifiers, String visibility, String type, String name, Iterable<String> parameters) throws IOException {
137                appendMember(modifiers, visibility, type, name, parameters);
138        }
139                
140        public void appendGeneralization(EClass subClass, EGenericType superType) throws IOException {
141                EClass superClass = (EClass) superType.getEClassifier();
142                collector
143                        .append(qualifiedName(superClass))
144                        .append(" ")
145                        .append(superClass.isInterface() && !subClass.isInterface() ? IMPLEMENTS_RELATION : EXTENDS_RELATION)
146                        .append(" ")
147                        .append(qualifiedName(subClass));
148                
149                if (!superType.getETypeArguments().isEmpty()) {
150                        collector.append(" : <");
151                        Iterator<EGenericType> it = superType.getETypeArguments().iterator();
152                        while (it.hasNext()) {
153                                collector.append(genericName(it.next()));
154                                if (it.hasNext()) {
155                                        collector.append(",");
156                                }
157                        }
158                        collector.append(">");
159                }               
160                
161                collector.append("\n");
162        }
163                
164        // --- ECore ---
165        
166        private DependencyTracer<EClassifier> OUT_DEPENDENCY_TRACER = new DependencyTracer<EClassifier>() {
167
168                @Override
169                protected Iterable<EClassifier> getDependencies(EClassifier obj) {
170                        Collection<EClassifier> ret = new HashSet<>();
171                        if (obj instanceof EClass) {
172                                EClass eClass = (EClass) obj;
173                                ret.addAll(eClass.getESuperTypes());
174                                for (EReference ref: eClass.getEReferences()) {
175                                        ret.add(ref.getEReferenceType());
176                                }
177                                
178                                ret.addAll(EmfUtil.collectTypeDependencies(eClass));                            
179                        }
180                        return ret;
181                }
182                
183        };
184                
185        private DependencyTracer<EClassifier> inDependencyTracer = new DependencyTracer<EClassifier>() {
186
187                @Override
188                protected Iterable<EClassifier> getDependencies(EClassifier obj) {
189                        Collection<EClassifier> ret = new HashSet<>();
190                        if (obj instanceof EClass) {
191                                ret.addAll(getSubTypes((EClass) obj));
192                                ret.addAll(getReferrers((EClass) obj));
193                        }
194                        ret.addAll(getUses(obj));
195                        return ret;
196                }
197                
198        };
199                
200        private DependencyTracer<EClassifier> bothDependencyTracer = new DependencyTracer<EClassifier>() {
201        
202                @Override
203                protected Iterable<EClassifier> getDependencies(EClassifier obj) {
204                        Collection<EClassifier> ret = new HashSet<>();
205                        if (obj instanceof EClass) {
206                                // In
207                                EClass eClass = (EClass) obj;
208                                ret.addAll(getSubTypes(eClass));
209                                ret.addAll(getReferrers(eClass));
210                                
211                                // Out
212                                ret.addAll(eClass.getESuperTypes());
213                                for (EReference ref: eClass.getEReferences()) {
214                                        ret.add(ref.getEReferenceType());
215                                }
216                                
217                                ret.addAll(EmfUtil.collectTypeDependencies(eClass));                            
218                        }
219
220                        // In
221                        ret.addAll(getUses(obj));
222                        
223                        return ret;
224                }
225                
226        };
227        
228        
229        /**
230         * Appends core classifiers, their related classifiers, and relationships
231         * @param coreClassifiers
232         * @throws IOException 
233         */
234        @Override
235        public void appendWithRelationships(
236                        Collection<? extends EClassifier> coreClassifiers,
237                        RelationshipDirection direction,
238                        int depth) {
239                
240                try {
241                        Set<EClassifier> coreSet = new HashSet<>(coreClassifiers);                              
242                        Set<EClassifier> relatedSet = new HashSet<>();
243                        
244                        switch (direction) {
245                        case both:
246                                relatedSet = bothDependencyTracer.trace(coreSet, depth);
247                                break;
248                        case in:
249                                relatedSet = inDependencyTracer.trace(coreSet, depth);
250                                break;
251                        case out:
252                                relatedSet = OUT_DEPENDENCY_TRACER.trace(coreSet, depth);
253                                break;
254                        default:
255                                break;          
256                        }
257                        
258                        Set<EClassifier> allClassifiers = new HashSet<>(coreSet);
259                        
260                        for (EClassifier rc: relatedSet) {
261                                if (!coreSet.contains(rc) && getEClassifierLink(rc) != null) {
262                                        allClassifiers.add(rc);                         
263                                }
264                        }
265                        
266                        for (EClassifier cc: coreSet) {
267                                appendEClassifier(cc, allClassifiers);
268                        }
269                        
270                        for (EClassifier rc: relatedSet) {
271                                if (!coreSet.contains(rc) && getEClassifierLink(rc) != null) {
272                                        String style = NcoreUtil.getNasdanikaAnnotationDetail(rc, DIAGRAM_STYLE_KEY);
273                                        if (style == null) {
274                                                style = RELATED_BACKGROUND;
275                                        } else {
276                                                style = Context.singleton("background", RELATED_BACKGROUND).interpolateToString(style);
277                                        }
278                                        
279                                        appendEClassifier(rc, style, allClassifiers);
280                                }
281                        }               
282                        
283                        for (EClassifier c: allClassifiers) {
284                                if (c instanceof EClass) {
285                                        for (EGenericType gsc: ((EClass) c).getEGenericSuperTypes()) {
286                                                if (allClassifiers.contains(gsc.getEClassifier())) {
287                                                        appendGeneralization((EClass) c, gsc);
288                                                }
289                                        }
290                                }
291                        }
292                        
293                        Set<EReference> processedOpposites = new HashSet<>();
294                        for (EClassifier c: allClassifiers) {
295                                if (c instanceof EClass) {
296                                        for (EReference ref: ((EClass) c).getEReferences()) {
297                                                if (!processedOpposites.contains(ref) && allClassifiers.contains(ref.getEReferenceType())) {
298                                                        appendEReference(ref);
299                                                        EReference opposite = NcoreUtil.getOpposite(ref);
300                                                        if (opposite!=null) {
301                                                                processedOpposites.add(opposite);
302                                                        }
303                                                } 
304                                        }
305                                }
306                        }       
307                        
308                        // Type dependencies
309                        for (EClassifier c: allClassifiers) {
310                                for (EClass src: getUses(c)) {
311                                        if (allClassifiers.contains(src)) {
312                                                appendTypeDependency(src, c);
313                                        }                               
314                                }
315                        }
316                } catch (IOException e) {
317                        throw new NasdanikaException(e);
318                }
319        }
320        
321        protected static String getMultiplicity(EStructuralFeature feature) {
322                if (feature.isMany()) {
323                        int lowerBound = feature.getLowerBound();
324                        int upperBound = feature.getUpperBound();
325                        if (lowerBound == upperBound) {
326                                return String.valueOf(lowerBound);
327                        }
328                        if (lowerBound==0 && upperBound==-1) {
329                                return "*";
330                        }
331                        return String.valueOf(lowerBound)+".."+(upperBound == -1 ? "*" : upperBound);
332                }
333                
334                return "";
335        }       
336        
337        /**
338         * @param ref
339         * @return Empty string if there are no EKeys, a comma separated list of EKeys in parenthesis otherwise.
340         */
341        protected String eKeys(EReference ref) {
342                StringBuilder ret = new StringBuilder();
343                EList<EAttribute> eKeys = ref.getEKeys();
344                if (!eKeys.isEmpty()) {
345                        ret.append("(");                
346                        ret.append(String.join(",", eKeys.stream().map(this::getLocalizedName).collect(Collectors.toList())));
347                        ret.append(")");
348                }
349                
350                return ret.toString();
351        }
352        
353        protected void appendEReference(EReference ref) throws IOException {
354                collector.append(qualifiedName(ref.getEContainingClass()));
355                collector.append(" ");
356                EReference opposite = NcoreUtil.getOpposite(ref);
357                if (ref.isContainment()) {
358                        collector.append("*");
359                } else if (opposite!=null) {
360                        collector.append("\"");
361                        collector.append(getLocalizedName(opposite));
362                        collector.append(eKeys(opposite));
363                        String multiplicity = getMultiplicity(opposite);
364                        if (!multiplicity.isEmpty()) {
365                                collector.append("["+multiplicity+"]");
366                        }
367                        collector.append("\" ");
368                }
369                
370                String diagramStyle = NcoreUtil.getNasdanikaAnnotationDetail(ref, DIAGRAM_STYLE_KEY);
371                String relationLine = Util.isBlank(diagramStyle) ? "--" : "-[" + diagramStyle + "]-";
372                String associationRelation = relationLine + ">";
373                
374                if (opposite == null) {
375                        collector.append(associationRelation);
376                } else {
377                        collector.append(relationLine);
378                        if (opposite.isContainment()) {
379                                collector.append("*");
380                        }
381                }               
382                collector.append(" ");
383                
384                String multiplicity = getMultiplicity(ref);
385                if (opposite == null) {
386                        if (!multiplicity.isEmpty()) {
387                                collector
388                                        .append("\"")
389                                        .append(multiplicity)
390                                        .append("\" ");                                         
391                        }
392                } else {
393                        collector.append("\"");
394                        collector.append(getLocalizedName(ref));                        
395                        collector.append(eKeys(ref));
396                        if (!multiplicity.isEmpty()) {
397                                collector.append("["+multiplicity+"]");
398                        }
399                        collector.append("\" ");                        
400                }               
401                
402                collector.append(qualifiedName(ref.getEReferenceType()));               
403                
404                if (opposite == null) {
405                        collector
406                                .append(" : ")
407                                .append(getLocalizedName(ref));
408
409                        collector.append(eKeys(ref));                   
410                        collector.append(genericTypeArguments(ref.getEGenericType()));
411                }
412                
413                collector.append(System.lineSeparator());
414        }
415        
416        protected void appendTypeDependency(EClass source, EClassifier target) throws IOException {
417                collector.append(qualifiedName(source));
418                collector.append(" ");
419                collector.append(DEPENDENCY_RELATION);
420                collector.append(" ");
421                collector.append(qualifiedName(target));                
422                collector.append(System.lineSeparator());
423        }
424        
425        /**
426         * Finds all subtypes in the resourceset. 
427         * @return
428         */
429        protected Collection<EClass> getSubTypes(EClass eClass) {
430                TreeIterator<?> acit;
431                Resource eResource = eClass.eResource();
432                if (eResource == null) {
433                        EPackage ePackage = eClass.getEPackage();
434                        if (ePackage == null) {
435                                return Collections.emptySet();
436                        }
437                        acit = ePackage.eAllContents();
438                } else {
439                        ResourceSet resourceSet = eResource.getResourceSet();
440                        acit = resourceSet == null ? eResource.getAllContents() : resourceSet.getAllContents();
441                }
442                Set<EClass> ret = new HashSet<>();
443                acit.forEachRemaining(obj -> {
444                        if (obj instanceof EClass && ((EClass) obj).getESuperTypes().contains(eClass)) {
445                                ret.add((EClass) obj);
446                        }
447                });
448                return ret;
449        }
450        
451        /**
452         * Finds all referrers in the resourceset. 
453         * @return
454         */
455        protected Collection<EClass> getReferrers(EClass eClass) {
456                TreeIterator<?> acit;
457                Resource eResource = eClass.eResource();
458                if (eResource == null) {
459                        EPackage ePackage = eClass.getEPackage();
460                        if (ePackage == null) {
461                                return Collections.emptySet();
462                        }
463                        acit = ePackage.eAllContents();
464                } else {
465                        ResourceSet resourceSet = eResource.getResourceSet();
466                        acit = resourceSet == null ? eResource.getAllContents() : resourceSet.getAllContents();
467                }
468                Set<EClass> ret = new HashSet<>();
469                acit.forEachRemaining(obj -> {
470                        if (obj instanceof EReference && ((EReference) obj).getEReferenceType() == eClass) {
471                                ret.add(((EReference) obj).getEContainingClass());
472                        }
473                });
474                return ret;
475        }
476        
477        /**
478         * Finds all type uses in the resourceset. 
479         * @return
480         */
481        protected Collection<EClass> getUses(EClassifier eClassifier) {
482                TreeIterator<?> acit;
483                Resource eResource = eClassifier.eResource();
484                if (eResource == null) {
485                        EPackage ePackage = eClassifier.getEPackage();
486                        if (ePackage == null) {
487                                return Collections.emptySet();
488                        }
489                        acit = ePackage.eAllContents();
490                } else {
491                        ResourceSet resourceSet = eResource.getResourceSet();
492                        acit = resourceSet == null ? eResource.getAllContents() : resourceSet.getAllContents();
493                }
494                Set<EClass> ret = new HashSet<>();
495                acit.forEachRemaining(obj -> {
496                        if (obj instanceof EClass && EmfUtil.collectTypeDependencies((EClass) obj).contains(eClassifier)) {
497                                ret.add((EClass) obj);
498                        }
499                });
500                return ret;
501        }
502                
503        public void appendEClassifier(EClassifier eClassifier, Set<EClassifier> allClassifiers) throws IOException {
504                String style = Context.EMPTY_CONTEXT.interpolateToString(NcoreUtil.getNasdanikaAnnotationDetail(eClassifier, DIAGRAM_STYLE_KEY));
505                appendEClassifier(eClassifier, style, allClassifiers);
506        }
507        
508        public void appendEClassifier(EClassifier eClassifier, String style, Set<EClassifier> allClassifiers) throws IOException {
509                if (eClassifier instanceof EClass) {
510                        appendEClass((EClass) eClassifier, style, allClassifiers);
511                } else if (eClassifier instanceof EEnum) {
512                        appendEEnum((EEnum) eClassifier, style, allClassifiers);                        
513                } else if (eClassifier instanceof EDataType) {
514                        appendEDataType((EDataType) eClassifier, style, allClassifiers);
515                }
516        }
517        
518        protected String qualifiedName(EClassifier eClassifier) {
519                EPackage ePackage = eClassifier.getEPackage();
520                if (ePackage == null) {
521                        return getLocalizedName(eClassifier);                           
522                }
523                return "\""+getLocalizedName(ePackage)+" ("+ePackage.getNsURI()+")."+getLocalizedName(eClassifier)+"\"";
524        }       
525        
526        protected String typeParameters(EClassifier eClassifier) {
527                if (eClassifier.getETypeParameters().isEmpty()) {
528                        return "";
529                }
530                StringBuilder typeParameters = new StringBuilder();
531                for (ETypeParameter typeParameter: eClassifier.getETypeParameters()) {
532                        if (typeParameters.length() > 0) {
533                                typeParameters.append(",");
534                        }
535                        typeParameters.append(genericName(typeParameter));
536                }               
537                
538                return "<" + typeParameters +">";
539        }       
540        
541        protected String genericName(ETypeParameter typeParameter) {
542                StringBuilder ret = new StringBuilder(typeParameter.getName());
543                for (EGenericType bound : typeParameter.getEBounds()) {
544                        if (bound.getEUpperBound() != null) {
545                                ret.append(" extends ").append(genericName(bound.getEUpperBound()));
546                        }
547                        if (bound.getELowerBound() != null) {
548                                ret.append(" super ").append(genericName(bound.getELowerBound()));
549                        }
550                }
551                
552                return ret.toString();
553        }
554        
555        protected String genericName(EGenericType eGenericType) {
556                if (eGenericType == null) {
557                        return "void";
558                }
559                StringBuilder ret = new StringBuilder();                
560                if (eGenericType.getETypeParameter() != null) {
561                        ret.append(eGenericType.getETypeParameter().getName());
562                } else if (eGenericType.getEClassifier() != null) {
563                        ret.append(eGenericType.getEClassifier().getName());                    
564                }
565                ret.append(genericTypeArguments(eGenericType));
566                return ret.toString();
567        }
568
569        protected String genericTypeArguments(EGenericType eGenericType) {
570                StringBuilder ret = new StringBuilder();
571                Iterator<EGenericType> it = eGenericType.getETypeArguments().iterator();
572                if (it.hasNext()) {
573                        ret.append("<");
574                        while (it.hasNext()) {
575                                ret.append(genericName(it.next()));
576                                if (it.hasNext()) {
577                                        ret.append(",");
578                                }
579                        }
580                        ret.append(">");
581                }
582                return ret.toString();
583        }
584
585        public void appendEClass(EClass eClass, Set<EClassifier> allClassifiers) throws IOException {
586                appendEClass(eClass, null, allClassifiers);
587        }
588        
589        public void appendEClass(EClass eClass, String style, Set<EClassifier> allClassifiers) throws IOException {
590                String modifiers = eClass.isAbstract() && !eClass.isInterface() ? "abstract" : null;
591                appendClassStart(modifiers, eClass.isInterface() ? "interface" : "class", qualifiedName(eClass) + typeParameters(eClass), getEClassifierLink(eClass), style);
592                if (isAppendAttributes(eClass)) {
593                        for (EAttribute attribute: eClass.getEAttributes().stream().sorted((a,b) -> a.getName().compareTo(b.getName())).collect(Collectors.toList())) {                 
594                                EGenericType eGenericType = attribute.getEGenericType();
595                                if (eGenericType != null) {
596                                        appendAttribute(null, null, genericName(eGenericType) + (attribute.isMany() ? "[]" : ""), getLocalizedName(attribute));
597                                }                                               
598                        }
599                }
600                collector.append(CLASS_COMPARTMENT_SEPARATOR_LINE);
601                for (EReference reference: eClass.getEReferences().stream().sorted((a,b) -> a.getName().compareTo(b.getName())).collect(Collectors.toList())) {
602                        EGenericType eGenericType = reference.getEGenericType();                        
603                        if (eGenericType == null || !allClassifiers.contains(reference.getEReferenceType())) {
604                                appendAttribute(null, null, genericName(eGenericType) + (reference.isMany() ? "[]" : ""), getLocalizedName(reference));
605                        }                                               
606                }
607                
608                collector.append(CLASS_COMPARTMENT_SEPARATOR_LINE);
609                if (isAppendOperations(eClass)) {
610                        for (EOperation op : eClass.getEOperations().stream().sorted((a,b) -> a.getName().compareTo(b.getName())).collect(Collectors.toList())) {
611                                Collection<String> parameters = new ArrayList<String>();
612                                for (EParameter parameter : op.getEParameters()) {
613                                        String paramString = getLocalizedName(parameter);
614                                        if (parameter.getEGenericType() != null) {
615                                                paramString = genericName(parameter.getEGenericType()) + " " + paramString;
616                                        }
617                                        parameters.add(paramString);
618                                }
619                                appendOperation(null, null, genericName(op.getEGenericType()), getLocalizedName(op), parameters);
620                        }
621                }
622                appendClassEnd();
623        }
624
625        /**
626         * Constructs {@link EClassifier} with the first documentation sentence as a tooltip. 
627         * @param eClassifier
628         * @return
629         */
630        protected String getEClassifierLink(EClassifier eClassifier) {
631                String link = null;
632                if (eClassifier != null && eClassifierLinkResolver != null) {
633                        link = eClassifierLinkResolver.apply(eClassifier);
634                        if (link != null && eModelElementFirstDocSentenceProvider != null) {
635                                String firstDocSentence = eModelElementFirstDocSentenceProvider.apply(eClassifier);
636                                if (!org.nasdanika.common.Util.isBlank(firstDocSentence)) {
637                                        link += "{" + firstDocSentence + "}";
638                                }
639                        }
640                }
641                return link;
642        }
643        
644        protected boolean isAppendAttributes(EClass eClass) {
645                return true;
646        }
647        
648        protected boolean isAppendOperations(EClass eClass) {
649                return true;
650        }
651
652        public void appendEDataType(EDataType dataType, Set<EClassifier> allClassifiers) throws IOException {
653                appendEDataType(dataType, null, allClassifiers);
654        }       
655        
656        public void appendEDataType(EDataType dataType, String background, Set<EClassifier> allClassifiers) throws IOException {
657                appendClassStart(null, "class", qualifiedName(dataType)+" << (D,orchid) >>", getEClassifierLink(dataType), background);
658                if (dataType.getInstanceClassName() != null) {
659                        appendAttribute(null, null, null, dataType.getInstanceClassName());
660                }
661                appendClassEnd();
662        }
663
664        public void appendEEnum(EEnum eEnum, Set<EClassifier> allClassifiers) throws IOException {
665                appendEEnum(eEnum, null, allClassifiers);
666        }
667        
668        public void appendEEnum(EEnum eEnum, String background, Set<EClassifier> allClassifiers) throws IOException {
669                appendClassStart(null, "enum", qualifiedName(eEnum), getEClassifierLink(eEnum), background);
670                for (EEnumLiteral literal : eEnum.getELiterals()) {
671                        appendAttribute(String.valueOf(literal.getValue()), null, getLocalizedName(literal), literal.getName().equals(literal.getLiteral()) ? "" : literal.getLiteral());
672                }
673                appendClassEnd();
674        }
675
676        protected String getTypeName(EClassifier type) {
677                String typeName = null;
678                if (type != null) {
679                        if (type instanceof EDataType) {
680                                typeName = type.getInstanceClassName();
681                        }
682                        if (typeName == null) {
683                                typeName = getLocalizedName(type);
684                        }
685                }
686                return getSimpleName(typeName);
687        }
688        
689}
